definition: to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean

sentences.english: And its also used as a freezproof agent and anti-freezing agent.
sentences.chinese: 作爲防凍劑和融雪劑廣泛用於融雪化冰。

sentences.english: And its also used as a freezproof agent and anti-freezing agent.
sentences.chinese: 作爲防凍劑和融雪劑廣泛用於融雪化冰。

sentences.english: Hold me close; melt my heart like April snow.
sentences.chinese: 抱緊我，將我的心如四月融雪般化開。

sentences.english: The structure was designed to channel melting snow around and away from the huts.
sentences.chinese: 這種設計是爲了將棚屋附近的融雪引導走。

sentences.english: Therefore, seeking the new method of deicing or snow-melting is of great importance to our daily life.
sentences.chinese: 因此，尋求新型的融雪化冰方法具有非常重要的意義。

sentences.english: The invention relates to a gutter snow melting plate.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及到一種天溝融雪板。

sentences.english: Some ice melters contain corrosion inhibitors, but these products have not always proven effective.
sentences.chinese: 某些融雪劑含有阻鏽劑，但這些產品不總是有效的。

sentences.english: In particular, snow is melting earlier in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 而且，春季的融雪時間也提前了。

sentences.english: Get a head start on spring run off by clearing gutters and down spouts of excess snow and ice.
sentences.chinese: 清潔檐溝和下水管過多的冰和雪來給融雪引流。

sentences.english: In addition, increasing meltwaters will trigger more floods and mud flows.
sentences.chinese: 而且，越來越多的融雪會導致更多的洪水和泥石流。

sentences.english: Marc fires up the stove for fresh water from snowmelt.
sentences.chinese: 馬克打着爐子，融雪取水。

definition: to defrost/to get rid of ice
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to freeze over (of water or land)
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
ice-jam flood (arising when river downstream freezes more than upstream)
